settings.title: Why is B. Draddy apparel more expensive than other polos and hoodies?
settings.text: Our apparel is crafted from the finest materials—like organic Peruvian Pima cotton and Scottish cashmere—designed for long-lasting wear, refined comfort, and elevated everyday style. You're investing in quality that performs and lasts for years.

settings.title: How is this better than a regular cotton polo?
settings.text: B. Draddy polos use long-staple Peruvian Pima cotton, known for its supreme softness, durability, and color retention. Add stretch, no-tag interiors, and golf-inspired tailoring, and you've got a better fit, better feel, and better performance than a standard polo.

settings.title: Is this really worth the price if I only wear it casually?
settings.text: Yes—these are everyday staples designed to look polished and feel effortless. Whether you're on the course, commuting, or lounging, they bring comfort, breathability, and timeless style to every scenario.

settings.title: JOIN THE FAMILY
settings.text: Also known as the Brothers Draddy, B. Draddy looks to the past and its icons for inspiration while using the most modern design and fabric techniques. What began with a polo shirt over ten years ago has evolved into a full collection of luxe, lived-in essentials for the course, the clubhouse, the commute and beyond.
